Html:
I'd like to use this tool after a TFS 2008 CI Build finishes. However, I can't seem to get things working based on your previous post:
http://blogs.msdn.com/rido/archive/2007/05/24/testresults-reports-in-tfs-builds.aspx

Do these instructions still work for TFS 2008? If yes, then can you please provide a sample TFSBuild.proj file?
